divs: Sighting Detailsokay,this is my story.one night i was putting my daugter to bed. she wasnt even a year old at the time.i layed her down on my bed,coverd her up and walked in to my living room to watch tv.i noticed a light shining down on the tree in my back yard.so i opened up my back door and steped out to take a look.what i saw was a trianlge shaped ufo with 1 light at each point,1 larger light in the middle orange in color.the crazy thing is there was no sound coming from the ufo at all.it was just hovering over the top of the tree.anyways,later i awoke sitting on my couch holding a burnt out cigertte.starring at the back door.a few days later,i started have these bad dreams,they were so bad i was afraid to fall asleep. in these dreams i see aliens.the aliens that i saw did not look like the aliens that are in the movies.these aliens are tall,with dark colored lizard like skin.long slinder hands and fingers.i can recall in my dreams hearing them make noises almost like they were talking.a few days after the dreams started i went to the hospital for pan in my head and back.the doctors didnt know what was wrong with me but they said my brain was swollen.i stayed there for a week.doctors released me when i was better,but with know answers as to what had caused me to fall ill.i link it to what i saw and possible alien abduction.after it first happened i tryed to tell people,but you can guess there reaction to my story.now i just try to live with it because it doesn't look like i will ever find the answer to what happend or why for that matter.alot has changed as to my views on life.i still beleve in my religon,but i also know for my self that we are not alone.i still have alot of question that will probably never be answered,as to why me,for what reason.
